name: Interdimensional Chrono Janitor Service
description:
Vote on the game for Ludum Dare 37!

You are an AI janitor from an apocalyptic future

Nearly all human life on Earth has been lost to The Singularity

Unfortunately, robots are perfectly clean, so your cleaning business has nothing to clean

Use your trusty time warp and bomb abilities to destroy rooms in the past so you can get more business in the future!

CLICK on room to place TIME BOMB that detonates when time advances
CLICK on play button on TIMELINE to enable auto-advancing
DRAG timeline handle back and forth to REWIND/FASTFORWARD
DESTROY as many items as possible and maximize CHAOS for the best score!

Sorry, no audio because of Unity timescale shenanigans!
